name: Trench
description:
Inspired from a combination of Desert Bus from Penn and Tellers "Smoke and Mirrors", and the fact this game jam (and the DBFH marathon) began around Remembrance Sunday.

While Desert Bus for Hope fights for the children, this hopes to remember the old who fought.

This game takes the idea of a game that actively does not want the player to be playing it, through hostile controls, obscure gameplay and outright randomness.

11 million soldiers died during WW1. Over 6 million allied and over 4 million from the Central Powers.

Your only goal is to survive as long as possible.
